changeSet.id: Create suppliers Index, Primary Key and Foreign Key to Product
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE SUPPLIERS ADD PRIMARY KEY (ID,SITEGUID)
ALTER TABLE CSVPROFILES ADD PRIMARY KEY (NAME)
ALTER TABLE XSITELIST ADD PRIMARY KEY (GUID)
